name: KINGFISHER 26
notes:
KINGFISHER 26 (Mk1 )1967 Sail Numbers 1 to 7
Rudder shaft inboard through transom locker. Fitted with outboard engine locker

KINGFISHER 26 (Mk2) 1968 to 1978. Sail Numbers 8 to 82
Rudder shaft inboard through cockpit sole, inboard engine fitted under cabin steps.


KINGFISHER 26JR 1976 to 1978. Sail Nos. as K26 but with JR at the end of the number.
Same ss K26 (Mk2) but junk rigged and fore cabin large window replaced with side portholes because mast stepped through fore cabin roof.
